1.0.0.name: language-agc
1.0.0.description: Syntax highlighting for Apollo Guidance Computer (AGC) assembly code

readme: AGC Assembly Highlighting ========================= This package provides syntax highlighting for Apollo Guidance Computer assembly, the language used to program the [Apolloâ€‘11](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Apollo_11) on its world-famous voyage to the moon. The [AGC source code](https://github.com/chrislgarry/Apollo-11) is freely available online. Information on the AGC assembly language itself may be [found here](http://www.ibiblio.org/apollo/assembly_language_manual.html). ### License [ISC](./LICENSE.md)
